attributes.action: Replace concurrent sentences with sequential for multiple offences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently a person who is convicted of several offences at one court appearance serves a sentence based on the longest sentence given. In future they should be added to each other to reflect the level of offences. e.g 3 offences rated at 5 years setence should be 15 years rather than 5 as at present
